long_description: Designed with lightweight, strong monel metal, these Pepper's Nevada polarized sunglasses keep your eyes shielded when you're out and about on sunny days. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Triacetate lens construction sandwiches a polyvinyl acetate layer between 2 outer acetate layers. Frames are constructed from lightweight monel metal-a sturdy material originally developed in the aircraft industry. Antique silver frames feature polarized smoke gray lenses for 100% UV protection that won't distort color perception. Pepper's Nevada polarized sunglasses are ideal for medium face sizes.
short_description: Designed with lightweight, strong monel metal, these Pepper's Nevada polarized sunglasses keep your eyes shielded when you're out and about on sunny days.
